name: Merry March
description:
Hello this is Merry March! My first visual novel!! I made her for my senior project at Stetson University in the Digital Arts major. I did all of the art, writing, coding, etc. Everything but the music! Which was done by Vindsvept on Youtube <3.

Merry March is a lighthearted fantasy visual novel featuring an entirely queer and autistic cast. It follows Margot as she receives a mysterious letter promising her help if she just goes to these three places and meets those people there. She meets Lyn, Eden, and eventually Oreste.

Thank you so much to anyone who plays it, I really appreciate it. She's a child of love, but a very rough child for sure. A labor of love and learning how to use ren'py and coding for the first time.
